name: Carrie Smith
tagline: A little taste of the projects I've been working on
body:
## Portfolio

### The Colours of Monet

After a visit to the MOMA I became a little fixated with how one might automatically detect colour palettes from images. I used Python to scrape a large collection of Monet paintings and [implemented k-nearest-neighbours with some colour correction using Python Imaging Library](http://www.carriesmith.ca/recurse/monet/Process/Colors%20of%20Monet%20-%20Color%20Processing.html) to extract primary colour groups. I completed the project by creating a data visualization.
